typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		SalesId as integer,
		SalesPersonId as integer,
		CustomerId as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		Sku as string,
		Price as decimal(10,0),
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		Quantity as integer,
		DiscountPct as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	modifiedAfter: ($modifiedAfter),
	modifiedBefore: ($modifiedBefore),
	entity: 'Sales.cdm.json/Sales',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Sales',
	corpusPath: 'sm2-corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'demoinsights',
	folderPath: 'sm2-exported/Sales',
	fileSystem: 'demoinsights') ~> SalesDeltaSource
SalesDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(SalesId),
	SalesPersonId = last(SalesPersonId),
		CustomerId = last(CustomerId),
		ProductName = last(ProductName),
		Sku = last(Sku),
		Price = last(Price),
		OrderDate = last(OrderDate),
		Quantity = last(Quantity),
		DiscountPct = last(DiscountPct)) ~> Deduplicated1SalesDeltaSource
Deduplicated1SalesDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		SalesId,
		SalesPersonId,
		CustomerId,
		ProductName,
		Sku,
		Price,
		OrderDate,
		Quantity,
		DiscountPct
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Sales
Sales select(mapColumn(
		SalesId,
		OrderDate,
		Sku,
		Quantity,
		Price,
		SalesQuantity = Quantity,
		DiscountPct
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSales
SelectSales derive(TotalTransactionLineItemAmount = Price * SalesQuantity,
		TotalTransactionSalesPriceAmount = (1-DiscountPct/100) * Price * SalesQuantity,
		TotalLineItemAdjustmentAmount = (DiscountPct/100) * Price * SalesQuantity) ~> DerivedSelectSales
DerivedSelectSales select(mapColumn(
		TransactionId = SalesId,
		TransactionLineItemId = SalesId,
		TransactionLineItemStartTimestamp = OrderDate,
		ItemSku = Sku,
		Quantity,
		TotalTransactionLineItemAmount,
		TotalTransactionSalesPriceAmount,
		ProductPriceAdjustmentPercentage = DiscountPct,
		TotalLineItemAdjustmentAmount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> TransactionLineItem
TransactionLineItem sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'TransactionLineItem.cdm.json/TransactionLineItem',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'TransactionLineItem',
	folderPath: 'stdm2-exported/TransactionLineItem',
	fileSystem: 'demoinsights',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusPath: 'stdm2-corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'demoinsights',
	truncate: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TransactionLineItemSink
